epics.title: User Registration and Authentication
epics.description: Enable secure customer account creation, login, and management to allow personalized appointment booking and management. This is foundational for tracking user activity and providing a seamless, secure experience.

stories.title: Customer Registration UI
stories.description: As a new customer, I want to register for an account via web and mobile so that I can book and manage appointments.

subtasks.title: Design Registration Form
subtasks.description: Create responsive registration form UI for web and mobile.

subtasks.title: Implement Form Validation
subtasks.description: Add client-side validation for required fields and password strength.

subtasks.title: Integrate with Backend API
subtasks.description: Connect registration form to backend registration endpoint.

stories.title: User Registration API
stories.description: As a backend developer, I want to provide secure endpoints for user registration and store user data securely.

subtasks.title: Create Registration Endpoint
subtasks.description: Develop REST API endpoint for user registration.

subtasks.title: Implement Password Hashing
subtasks.description: Hash passwords using industry best practices (e.g., bcrypt).

subtasks.title: Validate Unique Email
subtasks.description: Ensure email uniqueness in the database.

subtasks.title: Return API Responses
subtasks.description: Return success or error messages as appropriate.

stories.title: Customer Login UI
stories.description: As a registered customer, I want to log in securely to access my account and manage appointments.

subtasks.title: Design Login Form
subtasks.description: Create responsive login form UI for web and mobile.

subtasks.title: Implement Form Validation
subtasks.description: Add client-side validation for login fields.

subtasks.title: Integrate with Backend API
subtasks.description: Connect login form to backend authentication endpoint.

stories.title: User Authentication API
stories.description: As a backend developer, I want to provide secure login and session management for users.

subtasks.title: Create Authentication Endpoint
subtasks.description: Develop REST API endpoint for user login.

subtasks.title: Implement JWT/Session Management
subtasks.description: Issue and validate JWT tokens or manage sessions securely.

subtasks.title: Handle Authentication Errors
subtasks.description: Return appropriate error messages for failed logins.

stories.title: User Registration and Authentication Testing
stories.description: As a QA engineer, I want to verify that registration and authentication work as expected and are secure.

subtasks.title: Functional Testing
subtasks.description: Test all registration and login scenarios.

subtasks.title: Security Testing
subtasks.description: Test for common security vulnerabilities.

stories.title: SSL/TLS Setup
stories.description: As a DevOps engineer, I want to ensure all user data is encrypted in transit.

subtasks.title: Obtain SSL/TLS Certificates
subtasks.description: Purchase or generate SSL/TLS certificates for the domain.

subtasks.title: Configure Web Servers
subtasks.description: Install and configure certificates on web servers.

subtasks.title: Enforce HTTPS
subtasks.description: Redirect all HTTP traffic to HTTPS.

epics.title: Appointment Scheduling, Rescheduling, and Cancellation
epics.description: Enable customers to search, book, reschedule, and cancel appointments online, reducing manual errors and administrative workload while improving customer convenience.

stories.title: Appointment Booking UI
stories.description: As a customer, I want to search for available slots and book appointments via web and mobile.

subtasks.title: Design Calendar View
subtasks.description: Create a responsive calendar UI to display available slots.

subtasks.title: Implement Slot Selection
subtasks.description: Allow users to select and book available slots.

subtasks.title: Integrate with Booking API
subtasks.description: Connect UI to backend booking endpoint.

stories.title: Appointment Booking API
stories.description: As a backend developer, I want to provide endpoints for searching, booking, rescheduling, and cancelling appointments.

subtasks.title: Search Slots Endpoint
subtasks.description: Develop endpoint to return available appointment slots.

subtasks.title: Book Appointment Endpoint
subtasks.description: Develop endpoint to book appointments and prevent double-booking.

subtasks.title: Reschedule/Cancel Endpoint
subtasks.description: Develop endpoints to reschedule or cancel appointments.

stories.title: Appointment Management UI
stories.description: As a customer, I want to view, reschedule, or cancel my appointments.

subtasks.title: Display Appointments List
subtasks.description: Show upcoming appointments in user dashboard.

subtasks.title: Implement Reschedule/Cancel Actions
subtasks.description: Allow users to reschedule or cancel appointments from the UI.

subtasks.title: Integrate with Backend API
subtasks.description: Connect UI actions to backend endpoints.

stories.title: Appointment Booking and Management Testing
stories.description: As a QA engineer, I want to verify that appointment booking, rescheduling, and cancellation work as expected.

subtasks.title: Functional Testing
subtasks.description: Test all appointment management scenarios.

subtasks.title: Edge Case Testing
subtasks.description: Test edge cases and error handling.

stories.title: User Experience Design for Booking Flow
stories.description: As a UX designer, I want to design intuitive flows for booking, rescheduling, and cancelling appointments.

subtasks.title: Create Wireframes
subtasks.description: Design wireframes for all appointment management flows.

subtasks.title: Conduct User Testing
subtasks.description: Test wireframes with sample users and iterate.

epics.title: Automated Notifications and Reminders
epics.description: Send automated booking confirmations and reminders via email/SMS to reduce no-shows and improve customer experience.

stories.title: Notification Service Integration
stories.description: As a backend developer, I want to integrate with email and SMS providers to send notifications.

subtasks.title: Integrate Email Provider
subtasks.description: Connect to email service (e.g., SendGrid) for sending notifications.

subtasks.title: Integrate SMS Provider
subtasks.description: Connect to SMS service (e.g., Twilio) for sending notifications.

subtasks.title: Implement Logging for Failures
subtasks.description: Log failed notification attempts for monitoring.

stories.title: Reminder Scheduler
stories.description: As a backend developer, I want to schedule reminders to be sent 24 hours before appointments.

subtasks.title: Implement Scheduler
subtasks.description: Develop background job to trigger reminders.

subtasks.title: Handle Cancellations
subtasks.description: Ensure reminders are not sent for cancelled appointments.

stories.title: Notification Preferences UI
stories.description: As a customer, I want to manage my notification preferences (email/SMS).

subtasks.title: Design Preferences UI
subtasks.description: Create UI for managing notification preferences.

subtasks.title: Integrate with Backend
subtasks.description: Connect UI to backend to save preferences.

stories.title: Notification and Reminder Testing
stories.description: As a QA engineer, I want to verify that notifications and reminders are sent correctly.

subtasks.title: Functional Testing
subtasks.description: Test all notification and reminder scenarios.

subtasks.title: Preference Testing
subtasks.description: Test opt-in/opt-out functionality.

stories.title: Legal Review of Notification Content
stories.description: As a product manager, I want to ensure all notification content complies with legal and privacy requirements.

subtasks.title: Draft Notification Templates
subtasks.description: Prepare email/SMS templates for legal review.

subtasks.title: Coordinate Legal Review
subtasks.description: Work with legal team to review and approve templates.

epics.title: Admin Dashboard and Reporting
epics.description: Provide staff with an admin dashboard to view, edit, and cancel bookings, and generate reports for business insights.

stories.title: Admin Dashboard UI
stories.description: As an admin, I want a dashboard to view and manage all bookings.

subtasks.title: Design Dashboard UI
subtasks.description: Create responsive dashboard for admins.

subtasks.title: Implement Booking Management Actions
subtasks.description: Enable edit and cancel actions in the dashboard.

subtasks.title: Integrate with Backend
subtasks.description: Connect dashboard to backend endpoints.

stories.title: Admin Booking Management API
stories.description: As a backend developer, I want to provide endpoints for admins to view, edit, and cancel bookings.

subtasks.title: View Bookings Endpoint
subtasks.description: Develop endpoint to list all bookings for admins.

subtasks.title: Edit/Cancel Booking Endpoint
subtasks.description: Develop endpoints for editing and cancelling bookings.

subtasks.title: Admin Access Control
subtasks.description: Restrict access to admin endpoints.

stories.title: Reporting UI
stories.description: As an admin, I want to view daily, weekly, and monthly reports on bookings.

subtasks.title: Design Reports UI
subtasks.description: Create UI for displaying reports.

subtasks.title: Integrate with Reporting API
subtasks.description: Connect UI to backend reporting endpoints.

stories.title: Reporting API
stories.description: As a backend/data engineer, I want to provide endpoints to generate daily, weekly, and monthly reports.

subtasks.title: Generate Reports Logic
subtasks.description: Implement logic to aggregate booking data for reports.

subtasks.title: Reporting Endpoints
subtasks.description: Develop API endpoints for report retrieval.

stories.title: Admin Dashboard and Reporting Testing
stories.description: As a QA engineer, I want to verify that admin dashboard and reporting features work as expected.

subtasks.title: Functional Testing
subtasks.description: Test all admin dashboard actions.

subtasks.title: Report Accuracy Testing
subtasks.description: Verify accuracy of generated reports.

stories.title: Admin Training and Documentation
stories.description: As a product manager, I want to provide documentation and training for staff using the admin dashboard.

subtasks.title: Create User Guides
subtasks.description: Write documentation for admin dashboard features.

subtasks.title: Conduct Training Sessions
subtasks.description: Organize and deliver training for staff.

epics.title: Infrastructure, Security, and Compliance
epics.description: Ensure the system is secure, scalable, and compliant with technical requirements, including cloud hosting, encryption, and high availability.

stories.title: Cloud Infrastructure Setup
stories.description: As a DevOps engineer, I want to provision cloud infrastructure to host the application and database.

subtasks.title: Provision Cloud Resources
subtasks.description: Set up compute, storage, and networking resources.

subtasks.title: Deploy Application
subtasks.description: Deploy web and backend services to cloud.

subtasks.title: Deploy Database
subtasks.description: Set up and configure cloud database.

stories.title: Monitoring and High Availability
stories.description: As a DevOps engineer, I want to monitor system health and ensure 99.5% uptime.

subtasks.title: Set Up Monitoring Tools
subtasks.description: Install and configure monitoring (e.g., CloudWatch, Datadog).

subtasks.title: Configure Alerts
subtasks.description: Set up alerts for system downtime or performance issues.

subtasks.title: Implement High Availability
subtasks.description: Deploy application in multiple availability zones.

stories.title: Security and Compliance Review
stories.description: As an IT/security engineer, I want to ensure the system meets security and compliance requirements.

subtasks.title: Encrypt Data at Rest
subtasks.description: Enable encryption for all stored data.

subtasks.title: Conduct Vulnerability Scans
subtasks.description: Run security scans on application and infrastructure.

subtasks.title: Complete Compliance Checklist
subtasks.description: Review and document compliance with relevant standards.

stories.title: Performance and Load Testing
stories.description: As a QA engineer, I want to verify the system supports at least 500 concurrent users.

subtasks.title: Develop Load Test Scripts
subtasks.description: Create scripts to simulate concurrent users.

subtasks.title: Execute Load Tests
subtasks.description: Run load tests and analyze results.

stories.title: IT and Security Documentation
stories.description: As a product manager, I want to ensure all infrastructure and security configurations are documented.

subtasks.title: Draft Documentation
subtasks.description: Write documentation for infrastructure and security.

subtasks.title: Review Documentation
subtasks.description: Coordinate review with IT/security teams.
